column5: there is a severe winter storm watch out for the area for friday thru saturday. upto 10 inches of snow possible and poor driving conditions. this is not a joke. check with enivormental canada for weather warnings for the area.
Thanks, Teddi........bummer. At least we won't be coming thru there until Monday. Hopefully by then it will have melted or been plowed. Is there a road condition phone number so we can check?
it should be melted by sunday. the worst is going to be friday thru saturday morning. i am going to be there friday nite so i should have a poor trip up. i guess just drive slow and careful

good thing I'm not going to be traveling this week. We will be leaving in 2 weeks from today. Hope the snow and cold are on their last legs for everyone up north. Good luck to you guys this weekend. TonyO.
